titles.title: A resolution commending the North Atlantic Treaty Organization's adoption of regional plans and encouraging allies to align resources.
A resolution commending the North Atlantic Treaty Organization's adoption of regional plans and encouraging allies to align resources.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the North Atlantic Treaty Organization's (NATO) implementation of regional defense plans adopted at the 2023 Vilnius Summit. The resolution also urges swift implementation and resourcing of regional defense plans and encourages NATO allies to align defense spending and resource allocation in accordance with those plans.
